data.name: Wevr Transport™
data.description: Transport by Wevr is dedicated to bringing more immersive simulations into your life with our independent VR network.  It’s a new form of communication and storytelling. The unifying elements being creativity and exploration.  It might take a few years for Transport and its creative community to change the world -- but we can change the way you see it today.

changelog.change_log:
Transport Gear
1.2.0.0
In Headset Log-in! Logging in or creating free accounts no longer requires removing the phone from the headset and waiting for the web browser to open

New Audio System. We have replaced our previous audio system with Steam Audio, which brings improved spatialized audio for Transport’s experiences.
Improved telemetry

* Fixed an audio bug for playback on some video based experiences
* Updated placeholder poster for sideloaded files.

- Added the ability to exit the demo reel when starting Transport while not logged in
- Fixed a bug where downloaded content was inaccessible when in Offline mode
- Numerous other bug fixes and stability improvements
-

- Transport Premium.
- New Unauthenticated Landing Area
- Fixed a bug where the user was taken to Home after backing out of the dome for an interactive piece after viewing it.
- Privately shared content will now be displayed in a ‘Shared with Me’ channel in Home.
- Fixed a bug where content badges flicker briefly when selecting Downloads
- Various bugfixes and stability improvements to the video player.

-Log-in flow changes. All users are now required to log-in.
-    Improved reliability of login.
-    The UI has been reworked slightly: The default view in Transport HMD is now 'Home' and displays all available content. Library/User Initial has been renamed to 'Downloads,' 'Featured' is now 'Trending'
-    Download Progress is now displayed next to all posters in both Home and Downloads
-    Localization: Transport now supports French (note: not all content is localized)

- Improved stability of log-in
- Various feature additions to the video player
- Various bug fixes.

HOTFIX
-Fixed  a bug where the Title was being displayed instead of the Creator Name when in the detail view for a piece of content.

- Channels Update. Some content in the future will now reside in channels in the Explore menu.
- Various other bug fixes and stability improvements.

- Logging out of Transport will now remove all downloaded items.
- Added ability to cancel downloads and remove items from the download queue.
- Stability Improvements.

- Updated library badge graphics for 'New' and 'Ready for Download' states
  
-Improved messaging when selecting LIbrary while logged in to an account that doesn't yet own any content.
-Improved messaging and flow when already downloaded experiences have been updated. - Can now launch sideloaded videos directly from the Library menu. - Disabled some debug functions.
- Fixed an issue causing performance issues on newer handsets

- Clearer messaging for Login
- Fixed a bug where volume adjustment was not displayed during playback
- Implemented a "Back to Oculus Home" feature from root Transport menu.
